name: Capybara Echoes Demo (Sept 2021) Web Version
description:
My first ever game :')

I am not a programmer nor a game designer so sharing this game with you (whoever you are) feels like an amazing achievement.

This is a sweet and short demo of Capybara Echoes. It's the product of watching LOADS of Unity Tutorials on Youtube, countless hours goofing around in Photoshop and even more time banging my head against the wall because I did not know what I was doing.

Capybara Echoes will have a hybrid narrative style. Some parts of the story will be told as a visual novel (with branching) while other parts will be more 'playable', similar to this platformer.

Try to collect all electron tubes and defeat all enemies in this demo. There might be a nice reward at the end ;)

You can follow the project on Instagram and Twitter (@capybaraechoes).
